data.name: Wizcave
data.detailed_description:
Wizcave is a game in which you will have to fight and navigate obstacles while using your magic powers.

In the role of a wizard, you travel through mysterious unexplored underground caves. Your mission will now be to retrieve the enchanted artifact from these caves, but many enemies and obstacles await you on your way.

Enter a strange and magical world with endearing characters and magical powers to unlock along the way.

An action-packed underground adventure awaits you in the caves of Wizcave.
Can you unlock the secret of these caves?

Main Features:



  • Unique visuals
    A one-of-a-kind pixelated universe will remind you of nostalgic retro games of the era.
  • Improving your character
    Different spells and additions are available to improve your character and increase your power.
    Choose what suits you best!
  • Enemies and dynamic obstacles
    The universe has different types of enemies that you will have to face.
    A part of randomness is present in the game which makes each game unpredictable.
    Be creative in your battles!

data.short_description: Take on the role of a magician and explore the mystery of underground caves. Fight monsters and try to recover the artifact from these caves, use your staff to summon spells. The road will not be restless, you will encounter many obstacles and enemies during your journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.7 (Lion)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4670
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
